long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With SocialControl Youtube, you can take control of your Youtube experience, you can:
1- Hide or show comments in a video.
2- Hide or show comment likes.
3- Hide or show video like count.
4- Hide or show video views.
5- Hide or show recommended videos at the side of the screen.

Updates in version 0.0.1.1:
-Bug fixes.
-Small adjustments to the popup UI.

Feel free to contact us with complaints, suggestions, or anything else at social_control@yahoo.com
